overview: After having "left the dress" in her previous show, Caroline Vigneaux finds herself naked like Eve in the Garden of Eden. In her turn, she bites the apple, the forbidden fruit of the tree of knowledge... And as she takes a liking to it, she bites again and everything goes haywire: she discovers the truth about secrets that have never been discussed, and settles down at the Grand Point Virgule to reveal everything, even if it means breaking ancestral taboos!
title: Caroline Vigneaux croque la pomme
